snippet.title: Lost In Random: The Eternal Die Playtest Announce Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Here's a new trailer for action-packed, rogue-lite adventure Lost in Random: The Eternal Die, announcing the new playtest and where you can sign up. Play as Queen Aleksandra and wield her living die-companion Fortune, as they go all in against the ancient evil that took everything from her.

Wishlist it today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2564520

#convergenceshow #indiegame
